name: European Federation of Multiwall Paper Sacks Manufacturers
goal: EUROSAC is an association between the European manufacturers of multiwall paper sacks for the safeguarding, promotion and development of the European paper sack industry.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Single market

Circular Economy
